Articles: {"abstract": "The plunge in oil prices provides a fresh rationale for a combination of Halliburton and its rival Baker Hughes, if Halliburton can find cost cuts, Kevin Allison of Reuters Breakingviews writes.", "web_url": "https://dealbook.nytimes.com/2014/11/14/some-back-of-the-envelope-calculations-in-deal-for-baker-hughes/", "snippet": "The plunge in oil prices provides a fresh rationale for a combination of Halliburton and its rival Baker Hughes, if Halliburton can find cost cuts, Kevin Allison of Reuters Breakingviews writes.", "lead_paragraph": "Baker Hughes may be worth more than investors think.
